integration_gaps.description: M004 (Document Generator) has its own template system instead of using M006 (Template Registry)
integration_gaps.impact: HIGH - Templates are duplicated, M006's 35 templates unused
integration_gaps.recommendation: Refactor M004 to use M006's UnifiedTemplateRegistry

integration_gaps.description: M004 doesn't use M003 (MIAIR) for document optimization
integration_gaps.impact: MEDIUM - Documents not optimized using Shannon entropy
integration_gaps.recommendation: Add MIAIR optimization step in M004's generation pipeline

recommendations: 1. Refactor M004 to use M006's template system
2. Add MIAIR optimization to M004's document generation
3. Create integration tests for the full workflow
4. Consider creating a facade/orchestrator for the complete pipeline
